channel.title: DangerZone[508] Release! Custom Client included!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone This is the 508 pali-based server i have been editing for a while now!
[size=18pt]DangerZone[508][/size]
This server is a very good server to use if you want to experiment on a 508. It has everything essential.
Features: EventManager Fight Pits Duel Arena Bounty Hunter Kalphite Queen Warriors Guild GodWars Mage Bank Mage Arena(Dragon's Area) Castle Wars Grand Exchange Bank Tabs Almost every skill Complete! Smithing, Woodcutting, Firemaking, etc. Dragon Claws with spec! Dragon Platebody Staff of Light Quests Soul Split and Turmoil anims and gfx's added Wilderness Levels and Ditch Perfect PVP Combat Almost every special attack added! AutoCasting HD compatible Fully Animated KBD, Tormented Demons, etc. And so much more! You will have to download to see!
[size=18pt]Now time for the part everyone wants![/size]
[size=12pt]PICTURES:[/size]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ik2np0.png[/img] [img]http://]http://i53.tinypic.com/4zyfy1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/t0rlew.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2cful1y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/9fz51k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/210buzc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2wqvehg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dz8c9j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/f52dr9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16bzk07.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2z3tijp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/11ceeqf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ilk8qo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2n689io.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/24ya003.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/el1ppw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/4h8ped.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/24e5rpy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/9sc5s8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/107t4qq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/24fin81.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/xaz1ut.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/5by9tu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/waiv4h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2r5xbir.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qwdead.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rhjsbp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/17fo6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/iwpw14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ohiqte.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/96b3gi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/35iy4py.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/e6zke8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/rubgxt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/kyf6v.png[/img]

item.title: DangerZone[508] Release! Custom Client included!
item.dc:creator: @runner556 runner556
item.description:
@runner556 wrote:

lordlogic:

10/10but how do i make my self a owner i dont no how on this one pleasee tell me

i messed around with this server a few years back… i think its similar to the way you do it on a 317 server, but there is no owner

317 servers: prights1 = mod ;prights2 = admin ;prights3 = owner ;prights4 = hidden admin/hidden owner
508 servers: prights1 = mod ;prights2 = admin ;prights3 = nothing ;prights4 = nothing

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @runeslaer25 runeslaer25
item.description:
@runeslaer25 wrote:

Okay, so i got everything to work but when i click run in client…

It tells me:
windows cannot find ‘javaw’. Make sure you typed the name correctly, and try again.

This what is in run:
@echo off
cd files
start javaw Gui
exit

What do i do/change for it too work, this last thing i need…

Read full topic

item.title: DangerZone[508] Release! Custom Client included!
item.dc:creator: @Oshrimp Oshrimp
item.description:
@Oshrimp wrote:

You don’t need it decrypted to make yourself admin go to your “source” then “bin” -> “data” -> “Characters” -> “Mainsave” -> all characters in the data base are there. To chance it theres something that says “rights” 3 tabs over after username and password. You can edit that to 1 which is mod. 2 is admin. 3 is owner. There you go have fun! And since Jad isn’t completely on there you can put your “Killjad” a little further to the right at 1 so you can wear fire cape. Have fun!

Read full topic

@mewy121 wrote:

okay soo it says this when i run the source please help me! im new to this it says
@echo off
color 0c
title Starting…
echo Now starting DangerZone508… Please wait…
echo.
cd …/bin
title DangerZone508 - ONLINE
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause
________________________________________________________________________Okay soo im confused on this part and when i start the client i get this error!

If you help me i will rep you!

Read full topic

[quote=“smil3, post:15, topic:378416”]how can i run this client?

when i try to run,its just laggs and stops loading.please help me[/quote] uhhhhh extract the client to your cache (and then your desktop for easy access) so you can open the folder and then run the client from there

[quote=“i Ban U, post:96, topic:378416”]K WTF!!! When I want to make my self admin, I log out, then open the notepad and change the rights, save, then log back in at it restarts my whole account and starts from the beggining. And for some reason barrag3d’s acc is in korean or chinese, when i changed my right its went to a different language in the notepad but i still didnt have admin??? Plz help[/quote]Hmmm…I think it’s Wordpad you should use on PC’s. I use a Mac, so I am not entirely sure
